title:
Is the Elwell Ferry (crossing the Cape Fear River near Kelly, NC) still running as of Sept 2016? Is there a new bridge in the area near the old ferry?

Thank you. 

Lynn in Swansboro, NC
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2013/09/why-is-the-elwell-ferry-closed/
